history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0017
FULL TITLE : JOINT RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE INCREASE IN BASE PAY OF MILITARY AND UNIFORMED PERSONNEL IN THE GOVERNMENT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALONTE, MARILYN B.
DATE FILED : 2017-11-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

      4. Committee Report filed on 2017-12-05
